sentence.Network_en: Burmese troops successfully recaptured the region.
sentence.Network_cn: 缅甸军队成功地重新占领了这个地区.

sentence.Network_en: She has never given up her nationality. Even so, her opponents argue that she is not a true Burmese.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从未放弃过她的国籍。即便如此，反对者仍然说她不是真正的缅甸人。

sentence.Network_en: This area was to remain under Burmese control until 1927.
sentence.Network_cn: 到1927年为止,该地区一直受缅甸的管辖.

means.word_mean: 1. the Tibeto-Burman language spoken in northern Burma and Yunnan

auth_sentence.content: But the Burmese had a feverish sense of purpose.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the Burmese had a feverish sense of purpose.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the Burmese had a feverish sense of purpose.

auth_sentence.content: The Burmese regime has previously denied repressing ethnic groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Burmese regime has previously denied repressing ethnic groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Burmese regime has previously denied repressing ethnic groups.

auth_sentence.content: Burmese officials say new investments help support political reforms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Burmese officials say new investments help support political reforms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Burmese officials say new investments help support political reforms.
